description.en:
Incent’s Ingage app allows mainstream digital content creators to seamlessly earn crypto by rewarding their viewers, instantly and in-content, for their attention, regardless of which mainstream distribution platform(s) host their content. Ingage’s reward fuel is the INCNT cryptocurrency.

Incent monetises viewer attention on the back-end through programmatic advertising and content creators through premium services, with all fiat revenue recycled back into the open market for INCNT to manage Incent’s ongoing ledger commitments.

Since its launch in January 2020, Ingage has grown virally throughout the gamer-streamer community. As a result, over 7m INCNT tokens have been distributed to over 250,000 new crypto holders. INCNT was crowd-funded into existence following an ICO in late 2016. It is a cryptocurrency token which operates on the Waves blockchain. INCNT has a current supply of 46,016,598 and there are 46,016,573 in circulation.
